scripts.generate:api-client: docker run --rm -v ${PWD}:/local openapitools/openapi-generator-cli:v5.4.0 generate -i http://host.docker.internal/api-json -o /local/src/lib/api-client -g typescript-fetch --additional-properties=modelPropertyNaming=camelCase,supportsES6=true,withInterfaces=true,typescriptThreePlus=true
